data.name: jingor 2048
data.detailed_description:
PLAY 2048 IN THE CUBE EXPANSION(JINGOR FACE)!

Jingor 2048 is a puzzle game, can be used as a hobby, can challenge intelligence, can be leisure entertainment.

In the cube expansion, move the mouse to the corresponding position and press the up, down, left and right arrow keys to move the number until 2048 appears.
Of particular interest is the addition of numbers across an edge in the jingor face.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: PLAY 2048 IN THE CUBE EXPANSION(JINGOR FACE)! RULE:Move the mouse in the jingor face and press the arrow keys to move the number until 2048 appears. Of particular interest is the addition of numbers across an edge in the jingor face.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
